title: Why was I redirected to another website?
perex: Kiwi.com is also a meta-search engine.
content:
When customers search for flights on Kiwi.com they can also see third party results for some flights.

We want our customers to confidently search with the assurance that they will always find the best route - price combination for their booking, whether they book with Kiwi.com or one of our partners.
